column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Joy Hill]]'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien writes that he wore a gift from Joy on Christmas Day "with dazzling effect". He signs the letter "J.R.R.T" and notes that his contemporaries used to write his initials as "JR<sup>2</sup>T" and pronounce them "to rhyme with ''dirt''".<ref name=CG/>
